entry.title: Get Ready!
entry.content:
1. Please fill out this quick Google Form no later than July 8th. Youâ€™ll be working with a partner in this class and I want to make it as easy as possible for you to find a like-minded one.
  2. Be ready to discuss your answers to the questions in the form.
  3. Re-read the syllabus and show up to each class with sketching supplies (pencil/pen and paper/sketchbook).
